body:
On 2010-04-19 12:43 +0200, Vincent Lefevre wrote: 
 
> Are bugs which are marked as done taken into account before a 
> release? 
 
Yes, they are. 
 
Sven

subject: Re: Broken Debian's testing migration (grave bug in module-init-tools)
